description: The file implements part of the 'Monitor' plugin for the WPEFramework, providing functions for registering API endpoints, handling monitor actions such as restarting limits, resetting stats, and retrieving status information, along with event notification for actions.

classes.name: Monitor
classes.description: A class managing monitoring functionalities such as restart limits, stats resets, status inquiry, and event notification within the WPEFramework plugin.

methods.name: void RegisterAll()
methods.description: Registers all API endpoints and properties for the Monitor plugin.

methods.name: void UnregisterAll()
methods.description: Unregisters all API endpoints and properties for the Monitor plugin.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_restartlimits(const RestartlimitsParamsData & params)
methods.description: Sets new restart limits for a specified plugin identified by callsign.

methods.name: uint32_t endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData & params,InfoInfo & response)
methods.description: Resets memory and process statistics for a specific plugin and returns its current info.

methods.name: uint32_t get_status(const string & index,Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo> & response) const
methods.description: Retrieves the status (memory and process statistics) for a specific plugin or all plugins.

methods.name: void event_action(const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)
methods.description: Signals an action taken by the monitor, notifying observers.

ctags.name: endpoint_resetstats
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::endpoint_resetstats(const ResetstatsParamsData& params, InfoInfo& response/

ctags.name: event_action
ctags.pattern: /^    void Monitor::event_action(const string& callsign, const string& action, const string& reaso/
ctags.signature: (const string & callsign,const string & action,const string & reason)

ctags.name: get_status
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t Monitor::get_status(const string& index, Core::JSON::ArrayType<InfoInfo>& response)/
